name: to the ends of each of my fingers
name_original: to the ends of each of my fingers
description:
content warnings: this game is about eating disorders, eating disorder recovery, body dysmorphia, and trauma related to those topics, but please be aware that it could also be interpreted as being about a number of other possibly triggering topics as well, including assault or abuse.

a reflection on past selves, potential futures, bodies, and touch

game made using twine. visual assets made using ms paint, aggie.io, and ezgif.com.
